sections.heading: This Act shall be known as the Illinois National Register Advisory Council Act.
sections.text: This Act shall be known as the Illinois National Register Advisory Council Act.

sections.heading: There is recognized and established hereunder the Illinois National Register Advisory Council, previously established pursuant to federal regulations, hereafter called the Council
sections.text: Starting on January 1, 2025 the Council shall consist of 9 members. Of these, there shall be at least 2 historians, at

sections.text:
to perform the duties prescribed by this Act, the Council shall have the
following powers:

sections.text:
Department by law, the Department shall have
the following powers and responsibilities:

sections.heading: Notwithstanding any other provision to the contrary, the Council may recommend the removal of a place from the National Register of Historic Places if the place is a bridge that:
